name: LPError.Code
desc: Possible error values that can be returned from LinkPresentation APIs.

items.name: case metadataFetchCancelled
items.desc: An error indicating that the metadata fetch was canceled by the client.

items.name: case metadataFetchFailed
items.desc: An error indicating that a metadata fetch failed.

items.name: case metadataFetchTimedOut
items.desc: An error indicating that the metadata fetch took longer than allowed.
